edu.crypto2.transformations
Class ShiftRows

java.lang.Object
  edu.crypto2.transformations.ShiftRows
All Implemented Interfaces:
Transformation
public class ShiftRows
extends java.lang.Object
implements Transformation

Class ShiftRows

Task:
To shift State rows (first part of permutation)
State buffer will be transformed in following manner:

d4 e0 b8 1e ----> d4 e0 b8 1e
27 bf b4 41 ----> bf b4 41 27
11 98 5d 52 ---> 5d 52 11 98
ae f1 e5 30 ---> 30 ae f1 e5

Field Summary
 int Nb
          Nb is always 4 (by FIPS-197), but authors of AES left the space to change something in the future, so we wiil do the same
 
Constructor Summary
ShiftRows()
          Dummy constructor.
Task:
Just to set Nb to 4

Nb

public int Nb
Nb is always 4 (by FIPS-197), but authors of AES left the space to change something in the future, so we wiil do the same

initialize_State

Fills State array with initial values taken from inStr.

Parameters:
inStr - String inStr - 32 alphanumercis with hex values (16 bytes)

transform_state

public void transform_state()
ShiftRows.transform_state

State buffer will be transformed in following manner:

d4 e0 b8 1e ----> d4 e0 b8 1e
27 bf b4 41 ----> bf b4 41 27
11 98 5d 52 ---> 5d 52 11 98
ae f1 e5 30 ---> 30 ae f1 e5
